price: (Mariyamu) aravuga ati “Ni gute nagira umuhungu kandi nta mugabo nigeze, ndetse nkaba ntarigeze niyandarika?”
arabic: قَالَتۡ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞ وَلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālat annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun walam yamsasnī basharun walam aku baghiyyan
